Key Match Events: Nikola Vucevic finished with 23 points on 9-17 shooting, and had a double-double with 10 rebounds, 6 assists, and 2-5 from three-point range.
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls head coach Billy Donovan praised Vucevic's performance, stating he's been great with the young guys, shot the ball well inside and behind the line, and has been generating offense by putting the ball on the floor and attacking closeouts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nikola Vucevic has been averaging 21.7 PPG, 10.9 RPG, and 3.7 APG, and is shooting 54.8% from the field and 48.5% from deep.
Others: Vucevic has been nearly automatic from the charity stripe, making nearly 96% of his free throws.
The Bulls are in a position where they might look to trade Nikola Vucevic if his stock continues to rise.
